import React from 'react' import { useDispatch,useSelector } from 'react-redux' const Quizz = () => { const { quizzes } = useSelector( (state) => state.appInfo ); console.log(quizzes.quizzes[0]["quizname"],"d") return ( <>

{quizzes.quizzes[0]["quizname"]}

{quizzes.quizzes[0]["quizdescription"]}

{quizzes.quizzes[0].questions.map(question=>
  1. 12 + 2 = ?
    A. 14
    B. 34
    C. 55
    D. 90
    Edit
)}
) } export default Quizz
